CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Sub_Type__c), "Twins and Multiples"), "NCT Twins and Multiples workshop " & Target_Group__c, IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Sub_Type__c), "Waterbirth"), "NCT Waterbirth Workshop " & Target_Group__c, IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Sub_Type__c), "Early Days"), "NCT Early Days course " & Target_Group__c, IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Sub_Type__c), "Introducing Solids"), "Introducing Solid Foods workshop " & Target_Group__c, IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Sub_Type__c), "Baby Massage"), "NCT Baby Massage course " & Target_Group__c, TEXT(Sub_Type__c) & " " & Target_Group__c )))))
CustomField.label: Title
